name: searchcnit
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool french_cnit_type_mime_api.
Tool description: Lookup French CNIT / Mime Type values 
API description: Fetches information related to a French vehicle identification number (CNIT) using the specified license plate and function.

plate.description: The vehicle license plate number to search for. Defaults to '021A13'.

function.description: The specific API function to call. Defaults to 'getktypefornumplatefrancemineplate'.
